'''Awaken, My Kindred''' is an [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]]. This card can only be created by [[Guardian of Apep's Oasis (Character Card)|Guardian of Apep's Oasis]] and cannot be included in the deck otherwise.
